resources.string:
My Name is Adarsh Pandey and currently

 
i am persuing my B-Tech from SGSITS Indore 
currently i am doing my internship from Airtel Africa 
and learning Android Development on my own 
in this past coming week i would like learn this skill 
so that i can work on upcoming live projects.

Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme 
To explain in due time all I know 
Time is a valuable thing 
Watch it fly by as the pendulum swings
